DataElement.preferredName: Menstrual Cycle Within Last Six Month Occurrence Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no response regarding whether the patient has had a menstrual cycle (sloughing of the endometrium in the absence of fertilization) within the past 6 months.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Menstrual Cycle Within Last Six Month Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The Menstrual Cycle involves regularly recurring hormonal changes and physiologic endometrial changes during the reproductive period in human females, and some primates, and culminates in partial sloughing of the endometrium (menstruation) in the absence of fertilization. For most women, one cycle takes 28 days. (NCI)_On the inside; contained in._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Regularly recurring physiologic changes in the endometrium during the reproductive period in human females, and some primates, and culminating in partial sloughing of the endometrium (menstruation) in the absence of fertilization. The hormonal changes that lead up to a woman's having a period. For most women, one cycle takes 28 days.

Concepts.definition: The Menstrual Cycle involves regularly recurring hormonal changes and physiologic endometrial changes during the reproductive period in human females, and some primates, and culminates in partial sloughing of the endometrium (menstruation) in the absence of fertilization. For most women, one cycle takes 28 days. (NCI)

Property.preferredDefinition: On the inside; contained in.:Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one.:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: signs that a person has a condition or disease. Some examples of symptoms are headache, fever, fatigue, nausea, vomiting, and pain(NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
